beer.beer_description: A memorable and deceptively easy-drinking IPA. This is an authentic recreation of the beer style created for, and enjoyed throughout, the Empire. Goldings, Fuggles and American Cascade hops combine to give a crisp, citrus hop aroma, with a balanced, bittersweet finish. Strong and very memorable.

user.bio:
Jurassic beer hunter. 9300 beers, 7800 on cask. 1200 brewery ticks.
Need a new hobby! #Staggersaurus.

Check is out on youtube at https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCe4_gkqC-AER-39_H_x8igA

Instagram @scottreviewsthings

items.badge_description: We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 5 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 2! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

While a pint of traditional English ale will always remain a staple, the craft beer scene in England, much like the rest of the world, has continued to grow at a rapid rate! That's 10 different beers from a brewery from England! Try 5 more for Level 3!
